column1: The Appellant was issued summons by the Magistrate's Court on

05.02.2013, 
to  show  cause  on  19.03.2013.  On  that  day  the  Appellant
sought permission of Court to tender it in written form on 02.04.13, but

thereafter  moved  for  adjournment 
till  22.04.2013.  On  that  day, 
the
Appellant complied with the order of Court to show cause by tendering

an affidavit  with  annexures  marked  as  R1 
to  R15.  The  case  was  to  be
